version_description: bug fixes and minor improvements.
bug fixes and minor improvements.

New market UI and concept.
Bug fixes and improvements.

New market UI and concept.
Bug fixes and improvements.

- New Park Area: Build a beautiful park for your citizens!
- You can now sell higher level items for coins instead of trashing them!
- Animals provide more manure, making gardening missions easier to complete!
- Fixed various issues with the game UI based on your feedback.
- Improved the first-time play experience by touching up our tutorial.

- New Park Area: Build a beautiful park for your citizens!
- You can now sell higher level items for coins instead of trashing them!
- Animals provide more manure, making gardening missions easier to complete!
- Fixed various issues with the game UI based on your feedback.
- Improved the first-time play experience by touching up our tutorial.
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- New Town Hall Area: Build a sprawling town hall for your citizens and bring the old town back to life!
- New City Bank Feature: Spend energy to accumulate rewards in your safe and use a key to open it. The longer you wait before opening, the more rewards you get!
- Fixed several issues with the game UI. Thank you for your reports!

- New Town Hall Area: Build a sprawling town hall for your citizens and bring the old town back to life!
- New City Bank Feature: Spend energy to accumulate rewards in your safe and use a key to open it. The longer you wait before opening, the more rewards you get!
- Fixed several issues with the game UI. Thank you for your reports!

- New Town Hall Garden Area: Build a beautiful garden for your town hall and immortalize yourself with a golden statue!
- New Roadworks Area: Build a new road to connect your growing city!
- New Daily Mission Feature: Complete missions requested by your citizens every day and receive bonus rewards!

- New Town Hall Garden Area: Build a beautiful garden for your town hall and immortalize yourself with a golden statue!
- New Roadworks Area: Build a new road to connect your growing city!
- New Daily Mission Feature: Complete missions requested by your citizens every day and receive bonus rewards!

- Restoring an area just got a new touch up! Complete landmark missions and collect stars to fully restore an area.
- A new daily gift is now available in the shop!
- Coins are now available for purchase in the shop!
- The balance of landscaping missions got improved based on your feedback!
- Increased drop chance of piggy bank keys in market rewards!

- Restoring an area just got a new touch up! Complete landmark missions and collect stars to fully restore an area.
- A new daily gift is now available in the shop!
- Coins are now available for purchase in the shop!
- The balance of landscaping missions got improved based on your feedback!
- Increased drop chance of piggy bank keys in market rewards!

- New event: Merge and climb ranks to receive rewards!
- New: The Mall will open soon. Help renovating it!
- Revamped "My City" UI
- Various bug fixes

- Daily Offers now refresh every 8 hours and include more lucrative items!
- The Daily Reward got a refreshing rework! Unlock and upgrade buildings to increase your City Score and earn better rewards.
- You haven't heard of the City Bank yet? Olivia will now teach you how to fill your vault with valuable rewards.
